channel.title: Item Definitions - How to get correct definition?
channel.description: Hi, On my Project Insanity server, I'm looking for a better way for item examining. Because at the moment all it says is: It's a (itemName). And this is annoying. Is there any way I could load the definition from xml? Or items.cfg even, in the format of(id, name, definition). Could somebody please help me, or direct me to a tutorial or something that might help. Thanks.

item.title: Item Definitions - How to get correct definition?
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Hi,
On my Project Insanity server, I’m looking for a better way for item examining. Because at the moment all it says is: It’s a (itemName). And this is annoying. Is there any way I could load the definition from xml? Or items.cfg even, in the format of(id, name, definition). Could somebody please help me, or direct me to a tutorial or something that might help. Thanks.
